    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pravljični junaki - križanka</string>
            <string language="en">Book characters - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buchzeichen - Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Caractères de livre - mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caráteres do livro - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteri del libro - parole incrociate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χαρακτήρες βιβλίων - σταυρόλεξο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caracteres del libro - crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Križanka sestavljena iz besed povezanih s knjižnimi junaki iz pravljic.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword puzzle build of terms related to the book character (fairy tales).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pravljica</string>
            <string language="en">fairy tale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">knjižni junak</string>
            <string language="en">book character</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">križanka</string>
            <string language="en">crossword</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtselbau von Bezeichnungen stand auf 
dem Buchzeichen in Verbindung (fairy Geschichten).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La construction de jeu de mots croisé des 
limites a associé au caractère de livre (contes de fées).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A configuração do enigma de crossword dos 
termos relacionou-se ao caráter do livro (tales fairy).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La configurazione di cruciverba dei termini si è
riferita al carattere del libro (racconti fairy).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κατασκευή γρίφων σταυρόλεξων των όρων αφορούσε το 
χαρακτήρα βιβλίων (ιστορίες νεράιδων).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura del crucigrama de términos se 
relacionó con el carácter del libro (cuentos de hadas).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fairy Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buchzeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">conte de fées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">caractère de livre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mots croisé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tale fairy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caráter do livro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">racconto fairy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carattere del libro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">parole incrociate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία νεράιδων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτήρας βιβλίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταυρόλεξο</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">carácter del libro</string>

          <keyword>
